title: Aai Kuthe Kaay Karte
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. When Arundhati, a middle-aged housewife realises that her family takes her for granted, she sets out to make a second innings. Will she succeed?

title: Mulgi Zali Ho
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Born into a family that desperately wanted a boy, unwanted girl child Mau struggles for love and acceptance.

title: Sukh Mhanje Nakki Kay Asta
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. A caring Gauri lands up in the Shirke Patil house only to face insults. While she finds a confidante in Jaydeep, can she create her own place in the family?

title: Phulala Sugandha Maticha
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Ambitious Kirti, who aspires to become an IPS Officer, ends up marrying a school dropout and Mama's boy, Shubham. Will they find their 'happily-ever-after'?

title: Rang Maza Vegla
description: SHOW ON BREAK DUE TO GLOBAL COVID-19 SITUATION. Deepa's life is an ordeal due to the beauty stereotypes prevalent in the society. With Kartik as her soulmate, can she overcome the stigma?

title: Sahkutumb Sahaparivar
description: SHOW ON BREAK DUE TO GLOBAL COVID-19 SITUATION. Suryakant and Sarita More's life-line is their family. With blind trust and unconditional love at its core, will this family stand the test of time?

title: Saang Too Ahess Ka
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Superstar Swaraj is happily married to the loving but possessive Vabhavi. In a cruel twist of fate, her death marks the end of their story, but is it really?

title: Swabhimaan
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Dreamy-eyed middle-class Pallavi comes from a remote village. Shantanu has a poor opinion about such ambitious women. However, fate makes them cross paths.

title: Tanhaji
description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

title: The Legend of Hanuman
description: When the power-hungry Ravan tore through the world to unleash evil, in his way stood a humble vaanar awoken to his divinity to become an immortal legend.

title: Special Ops
description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

title: Hostages
description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

title: OK Computer
description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?

title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya Sareen's blissful family life is jeopardised when greed consumes her loved ones. With crime as her legacy, can she escape from what she hates the most?

title: Criminal Justice
description: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare when Aditya wakes up covered in blood. All evidence is against him, but he doesn't remember anything. Is he guilty?

title: Live Telecast
description: TV show director Jenifer Matthew will do anything to win the TRP game, and a supposedly haunted house in a sleepy hill station may just be her golden ticket.

title: Tuzya Ishqacha Naadkhula
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Raghu is deeply in love with Swati, his childhood friend. While she sees him only as a friend, can Raghu turn this friendship into love?

title: Dakkhancha Raja Jyotiba
description: NEXT EPISODE ON 19 APRIL. Combined with the power of the Trimurti, warrior god Jyotiba was born. Witness his story of valor and true devotion.

title: City of Dreams
description: An assassination attempt triggers a dirty power struggle between the Gaikwad siblings. With the throne at stake, the lines blur between moral and immoral.

title: Special Ops
description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

title: Hostages
description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

title: Anbudan Kushi
description: Born in a conservative family, an ambitious Kushi is married off to a middle-class boy, Anbudan. Will he support Kushi and give wings to her dreams?

title: OK Computer
description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?

title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya Sareen's blissful family life is jeopardised when greed consumes her loved ones. With crime as her legacy, can she escape from what she hates the most?

title: Selfie with Bajrangi
description: Ankush's life changes when he meets a mysterious nine-year-old child named Bajrangi, who is visible to nobody but him. Together, they learn the importance of togetherness, friendship, and trust.

title: Criminal Justice
description: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare when Aditya wakes up covered in blood. All evidence is against him, but he doesn't remember anything. Is he guilty?

title: Paavam Ganesan
description: Ganesan, who lets the world walk over him, gets burdened with the responsibility of his family. What does fate have in store for this paavam young man?

title: Live Telecast
description: TV show director Jenifer Matthew will do anything to win the TRP game, and a supposedly haunted house in a sleepy hill station may just be her golden ticket.

title: Sofia The First
description: Sofia, an adventurous little girl becomes a princess overnight after her mom marries the king.

title: Bigg Boss
description: Friendships and enmity will be tested again with high-octane drama and controversies. Stay tuned for yet another season of Bigg Boss

title: Velaikkaran
description: Loyal servant Velan's life flips on his 30th birthday when he becomes the heir to his master's empire. How will he navigate this changed power dynamics?

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos’ actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Neeya Naana
description: A talk show where two polarised groups of society are given the platform to share their views and see a different perspective on socially-relevant topics.

title: Vijay TV Awards
description: Join the cast of Star Vijay's most popular shows for an entertaining awards night and a roller coaster of emotions as you root for your favourites!

title: Phineas and Ferb
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

title: Kaatrin Mozhi
description: Kanmani, a mute girl, only longs for the affection of her cold and distant father, and is oblivious to Santhosh's love for her. How will their life shape up?

title: Kaariyavadhi
description: An orphan named White enters Ongole market to start a new life. Little does he know that he is going to be hit by a life-changing blast from the past.

title: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Spider-man's greatest enemies are back and he needs a new team: a team put together by Spider-man himself including Agent Venom, Iron Spider and Scarlet Spider.
